triviaClues: Sea cucumber is prized for its unique gelatinous texture and is considered a delicacy with health benefits in traditional Chinese medicine.
The rehydration process for dried sea cucumber can take several days.
It's a dish often served at banquets and special occasions, symbolizing prestige.

HARD.description: A simple yet luxurious Japanese dish consisting of fresh, raw sea urchin roe (uni) served generously over a bed of seasoned sushi rice.
triviaClues: Uni is known for its rich, briny, and slightly sweet flavor, often described as tasting of the ocean.
The quality of uni is highly dependent on its freshness and the season it's harvested.
It's a seasonal delicacy, often enjoyed in late spring to early autumn.

dishOptions.name: Kaisen Don
dishOptions.reason: Kaisen Don is a general seafood rice bowl with various types of raw fish and seafood, not specifically focused on uni.

dishOptions.name: Chirashi Don
dishOptions.reason: Chirashi Don is a bowl of sushi rice topped with various scattered sashimi, not a dedicated uni dish.

dishOptions.name: Ikura Don
dishOptions.reason: Ikura Don features salmon roe (ikura) over rice, which has a popping texture, distinct from the creamy, melt-in-your-mouth texture of uni.

dishOptions.name: Sea Urchin Pasta
dishOptions.reason: Sea Urchin Pasta is a Western-influenced dish where uni is incorporated into a pasta sauce, a cooked preparation, unlike the raw presentation of Uni Don.

dishOptions.name: Uni Sushi
dishOptions.reason: Uni sushi typically involves a small piece of uni on a rice ball (nigiri) or wrapped in nori (gunkanmaki), whereas Uni Don is a bowl of rice generously topped with uni.

HARD.targetDish: Steamed Abalone with Ginger and Scallions
HARD.description: A tender abalone, often whole, gently steamed with a fragrant sauce of soy sauce, ginger, and scallions to highlight its natural flavor.
triviaClues: Abalone is a highly prized shellfish in Chinese cuisine, often served at banquets as a symbol of prosperity.
Its texture is firm yet tender when properly cooked, a balance that requires precision.
Freshness is key to its delicate, oceanic flavor.

dishOptions.name: Sashimi Abalone

dishOptions.name: Stir-fried Abalone
dishOptions.reason: Stir-fried abalone involves quick cooking in a wok with other ingredients, which is different from the gentle steaming that highlights abalone's natural flavor.
